ReshiramCCMod.name: Reshiram
ReshiramCCMod.description:
<c=f4f7f0>RESHIRAM</c>
A legendary dragon that represents truth. Its cards utilize <c=ff687d>heat</c> alongside <c=boldPink>other debuffs</c> to set enemy ships ablaze.

Solar Flare.name: SUMMON SOLAR FLARE
Solar Flare.description: Changes the current field effect to <c=status>SOLAR FLARE</c>.

Non-Attack Stun.name: NON-ATTACK STUN
Non-Attack Stun.description: Cancel intents on the enemy ship that are not attacks.

Fire Gem.name: FIRE GEM
Fire Gem.description: Every 5th time you or the enemy gains <c=status>heat</c>, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c>.

Heat Rock.name: HEAT ROCK
Heat Rock.description: At start of combat, enemy gains 1 <c=status>FLAMMABLE</c>.

Flame Orb.name: FLAME ORB
Flame Orb.description: The first time you gain <c=status>heat</c> each turn, gain 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> and one more <c=status>heat</c>.

description.B: Summon a <c=status>Solar Flare</c>. If already present, apply 2 <c=status>flammable</c>.

description.None: Deal 1 <c=keyword>pierce</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> on each ship{{damageString}}.
description.A: Deal 1 <c=keyword>pierce</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> on each ship{{damageString}}.
description.B: Both ships gain 1 <c=status>heat</c>. Deal 1 <c=keyword>pierce</c> damage per <c=status>heat</c> on each ship{{damageString}}.

Smoldering.name: SMOLDERING
Smoldering.description:
After <c=status>heat</c> is inflicted, take <c=boldPink>{0}</c> hull damage if above the <c=ff687d>overheating</c> threshold.
<c=ff687d>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>

Safeguard.name: SAFEGUARD
Safeguard.description:
This ship cannot gain <c=status>heat</c>.
<c=ff687d>Decreases by 1 at end of turn.</c>
